thongtin: The grandson saw that his grandfather had been single for a long time, so he took a wife less than 30 years old for him.
Seeing that the grandfather liked the neighbor's grandmother but did not dare to confess, the grandchild pushed the boat to help him, who expected the neighbor's grandmother to like his grandchild.
Hearing the good news from his son, he was deaf when he was about to have a grandchild, he lost his hearing so his wife was pregnant while the two of them had not slept together for 3 years.
Taking care of my grandchild for 3 years, I suddenly received an envelope of nearly 200 million VND from my daughter-in-law. I cried when I learned the truth.
Grandson is not son's son, mother-in-law found out and beat daughter-in-law
When the daughter-in-law gave birth to a grandchild, the grandfather suddenly became greedy and wanted to return to spring, so he went to find another child outside.

The daughter-in-law was born prematurely, at that time the father-in-law was at home with his daughter-in-law, he delivered the birth to his daughter-in-law, but after that time, the father-in-law was very haunted because he saw all the parts of the daughter-in-law, on one day. beautiful weather 2 years later, father-in-law and daughter-in-law had sex

On the day of celebrating their 1-month-old grandchild, the daughter-in-law's best friend visited the young couple. The grandfather saw her. She was a single woman, divorced from her husband, and she wanted a relationship. During a shady sexual relationship, her father-in-law tried to contact her, resulting in her father-in-law and her having sex for a while.
tomLuocText: Joy led to a hilarious mishap

thongtin: Walking on the street, his daughter-in-law called to tell him the good news that he was about to become a grandfather, he was so happy that he speeded up the car and ended up with all his teeth.
Son gives good news to grandparents who are about to be promoted, but do not know that the child is the product of his wife and father

When he heard that he was going to have a grandchild, he was so happy that he forgot to send an email. When I looked back at my computer, I saw that I had sent the wrong email to my boss and wrote: I love you, I want to marry you.
Knowing that she was about to become a grandmother, she rushed to her son's house, but went to the wrong house and slept with her son's neighbor.

Knowing that they were going to have a grandchild, the grandparents sold their house in the city to live with their son, but only after selling the house did they realize that the two children had tricked them into buying that house of theirs.
When the son and his wife gave birth, the son's friend came to visit the newborn. Unexpectedly, the grandmother became acquainted and started dating this young man.
He was shocked when his grandson belonged to his son and ex-girlfriend.
Visiting her newborn grandchild, her mother-in-law held her grandchild and was peed on her hand.

She had not brushed her teeth for 3 years and heard her son announce that she was about to become a grandmother, she was so happy she kissed her husband on the lips and he died instantly because her mouth was too rotten.
Seeing that the neighbor's grandparents were promoted to grandparents, the elderly couple decided to kidnap their grandchildren so that they could also be promoted to the same position as them.

When she heard that her son was about to have a grandson, she was so happy that she forgot she was teaching. When I remembered, I had a class, but the principal called me to notify me of my dismissal.
She was shocked when she heard that her son without a girlfriend announced that he was going to have a grandchild.
She was shocked when her son got her boyfriend's daughter pregnant.
An old couple fought with a split forehead just because they wanted their daughter-in-law to have a daughter.

Hearing the news that their son was about to become a grandparent, the two happily went to show it to everyone in the village, but when they returned home, they remembered that their lover was also a boy, how did they have children?
When he heard that he was going to have a grandchild, he was so happy that he laughed day and night, sending his children to a mental hospital.
Hearing from the neighbors that he was about to become a grandfather, he was very happy to jump around, but his grandfather has been dead for 70 years and no one has ever had a grandchild.
